entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2 except 6 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2 except 6 inland. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
